title: 6 Cool Piercings That’ll Have You Running to the Nearest Studio
description: Few things are as adrenaline-inducing as getting a new piercing. Of course, the moment you actually get pierced is always the most intense, but one of the most fun parts is figuring out what you're going to get and where it's going to be located. Gone are the days of having one simple lobe piercing on each ear. These days, people are traveling far and wide to make their wildest piercing ideas come true. The trendiest options taking over this year feel both nostalgic and creative. The choices are endless, whether it's a cool new ear piercing location or something a bit more edgy like a septum piercing. However, with so many cool piercings available, we know it's all too easy to get caught up in the many different names and options. So, we consulted professional piercers to discuss six ideas for the best piercings to get in 2025, from cartilage and vertical stacks to snake bites and statement jewelry. Keep reading for the piercings you'll see everywhere this year - and get ready to load up on inspiration for your next trip to the studio. Experts Featured in This Article Jennifer Turner is the piercing and innovation director at Banter by Piercing Pagoda. Brian Keith Thompson is a celebrity piercer and the owner of Body Electric Tattoo in Los Angeles.
author: Catharine Malzahn
excerpt: Six cool piercing ideas to get in 2025, according to experts. These are the best piercings to get, including face-piercing ideas.
